BreadcrumbHomeNPDES Permits Around the NationKentucky NPDES PermitsIn Kentucky, EPA has delegated authority to issue NPDES permits to the Kentucky Energy and Environment Cabinet.For state-issued permits, visitKentucky Pollutant Discharge Elimination SystemContact Us About NPDES Permits Around the Nationto ask a question, provide feedback, or report a problem.Last updated on November 12, 2024
